About Me

Hi!

My name is Edvard Busck-Nielsen and I've had a interest in technology and creating for as long as I can remember and I have been programming for about 6 years and would like to make it my job. I enjoy creating and solving problems because nothing else gives you that special feeling of success! I have thought myself HTML5, Python, Shell Script and Linux, as well as a lot of different tools and programs. There is nothing better than to create something new and experiment with new stuff, I'm constantly crowing and I enjoy learning about new things.

Portfolio

All Python Shell Script Apps

Bullet Journal Companion

The bullet journal companion is the ultimate app for your bullet journal and bridges the analog and the digital world.


Enkelt Programming Language

The worlds first swedish programming language. Winner of TekNatur 2019.


Huffman Compression Algo

A program that compresses text using huffman coding.


Kelly

A basic proof of concept programming language written in Python.


MicroLog

A simple terminal work/time log focused on speed, usability and flexibility.


Oclock

A Pomodoro timer that uses a dark and distraction-free UI so that you can comfortably put your phone on your desk while working.


PyEpoch

A Python module that can convert timezones, set time and calculate seconds since the UNIX epoch.


The Onyx Bash Project

A collection of tools/programs that run in the Linux terminal environment and are completly text-based.
